name: Bandages for the Field
tooltip:
Bandages for the Field

Bring 30 Heavy Runecloth Bandages, 30 Heavy Silk Bandages and 30 Heavy Mageweave Bandages to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing X in order to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Heavy Runecloth Bandage x 30
- Heavy Mageweave Bandage x 30
- Heavy Silk Bandage x 30
